mapper.select: SELECT fli.flight_number, pro.product_number, pro.product_name, pro.product_country, pro.product_stay_days, pro.product_summary, pro.product_price_adult, pro.product_price_child, pro.product_price_baby, pro.product_average_score, fli.flight_start_date, fli.flight_start_departure, fli.flight_start_arrival, fli.flight_start_airline, fli.flight_start_departure_city, fli.flight_start_arrival_city, fli.flight_end_date, fli.flight_end_departure, fli.flight_end_arrival, fli.flight_end_airline, fli.flight_end_departure_city, fli.flight_end_arrival_city FROM product pro, flight fli WHERE pro.product_number = fli.product_number and pro.product_banner = 1 and pro.product_number=#{product_number}
